mapper.sql: SELECT qnaNo , memberNo , qnaTitle , qnaContent , writeDate , hit FROM QnA

SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM (
ORDER BY qnaNo DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnA( qnaNo, memberNo, qnaTitle, qnaContent, writeDate, hit) VALUES( qna_seq.nextval, #{memberNo }, #{qnaTitle }, #{qnaContent }, #{writeDate }, #{hit }, ( SELECT memberId FROM member WHERE memberId=#{memberId } ), #{qnaContent } )
mapper.select: SELECT M.memberNo,M.memberName,M.memberId, M.memberNick, M.subCheck, S.postCode, S.roadAddress, S.jibunAddress, S.detailAddress, S.extraAddress FROM member M, subscription S WHERE M.memberNo = S.memberNo AND M.memberNo = #{M.memberNo}
